Let's move out..."},{"lineNumber":54626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラーーーンスーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Raaaanceee!"},{"lineNumber":54627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh?"},{"lineNumber":54628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっほー、来ちゃった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Heya, I came."},{"lineNumber":54629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カスタムに行くんでしょ？　あたしも行くよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're going to Custom, right? I'm coming too!"},{"lineNumber":54630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ミルか。なんだ、こっちに来てたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mil, huh. So you were over here."},{"lineNumber":54631,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、ラン姉ちゃんと一緒にね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, with big sister Ran."},{"lineNumber":54632,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、ランスには会っちゃダメーって言われて」","translatedEnglishLine":"But I was told not to meet Rance."},{"lineNumber":54633,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーー……うーむ、重症だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahh... hmm, that's serious."},{"lineNumber":54634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、こっそり来ちゃった。","translatedEnglishLine":"So I came secretly."},{"lineNumber":54635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ね、ね、ランス。あたしを連れて、逃げて♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, hey, Rance. Take me with you, let's run away ♪"},{"lineNumber":54636,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミルはランスにするりと近づき、しなを作る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Mil smoothly approached Rance and arched her back."},{"lineNumber":54637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスの……初めての人のためなら頑張るよ？","translatedEnglishLine":"For Rance... if it's for your first time, I'll do my best, okay?"},{"lineNumber":54638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦う方も、エロい方も……ね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Both in battle and in the erotic side... okay?"},{"lineNumber":54639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあよかろう。連れてってやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, all right. I'll take you with me."},{"lineNumber":54640,"originalJapaneseLine":"　足は引っ張るなよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't slow me down."},{"lineNumber":54641,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーい、やったー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yay, I did it!"},{"lineNumber":54642,"originalJapaneseLine":"（初めて会った頃に比べれば充分食べ頃に育ったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Compared to when I first met her, she's matured enough to be 'ripe',"},

{"lineNumber":54643,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中身はまだガキだな……","translatedEnglishLine":"but inside she's still a kid..."},

{"lineNumber":54644,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、瞬間的にムラッと来たら襲えばいいか）","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, if I get a sudden urge, I can just attack then."},

{"lineNumber":54645,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では……出発しますか、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then... shall we depart, Lord Rance?"},

{"lineNumber":54646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう。カスタムへゴーだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah. Let's go to Custom."},

{"lineNumber":54647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここを……こうして……ああ違う、","translatedEnglishLine":"Here... like this... Ah no,"},

{"lineNumber":54648,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちを先に書いておかないと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I need to write this part first..."},

{"lineNumber":54649,"originalJapaneseLine":"進軍の休憩中、マリアは何か書き物をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"During the march break, Maria was writing something."},

{"lineNumber":54650,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何やってんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you doing?"},

{"lineNumber":54651,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん。チューリップ3号を起動させる","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm. I'm compiling the steps to activate Tulip No. 3."},

{"lineNumber":54652,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手順をまとめててね。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm summarizing the procedure."},

{"lineNumber":54653,"originalJapaneseLine":"　現地で混乱しないようにしないと」","translatedEnglishLine":"So we don't get confused on site."},

{"lineNumber":54654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう全部ぶっ壊されてたりして」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe everything's already been destroyed."},

{"lineNumber":54655,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やめてよも〜……心配なんだから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Stop it... I'm worried you know."},

{"lineNumber":54656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、起動にメモって、そんな厄介なのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"But, writing notes to start it up, is it really that troublesome?"},

{"lineNumber":54657,"originalJapaneseLine":"　使い物になるんだろうな」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's going to be usable, right?"},

{"lineNumber":54658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうでもないわよ。私じゃなくて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Not exactly. It's so that the other disciples don't get stuck, not me."},

{"lineNumber":54659,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他の弟子達が手間取らないように、だもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't want the other disciples to have difficulties."},

{"lineNumber":54660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ……そういえばなんか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... come to think of it,"},

{"lineNumber":54661,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前んとこの女の子が付いてきてたな」","translatedEnglishLine":"one of the girls from your group was following along."},

{"lineNumber":54662,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが振り返ると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance turned around,"},

{"lineNumber":54663,"originalJapaneseLine":"作業着姿の女の子の集団が、","translatedEnglishLine":"a group of girls dressed in work clothes were,"},

{"lineNumber":54664,"originalJapaneseLine":"思い思いに休憩を取っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"taking breaks as they pleased."},

{"lineNumber":54665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":".........."},

{"lineNumber":54666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一人くらいつまみ食いしてもいいか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it okay if I sneak a bite of just one?"},

{"lineNumber":54667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………絶対だめ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Absolutely not."},

{"lineNumber":54668,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市地帯中部、ゴア――――","translatedEnglishLine":"Central Free City Zone, Goa――――"},

{"lineNumber":54669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":".........."},

{"lineNumber":54670,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイは、単身で","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Ray, alone,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、まぁいいだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, well, I suppose it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それに、閉園中の遊園地なんぞで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Besides, can I really stay holed up for two or three days in an amusement park that's closed?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二日も三日もひきこもってられるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't stay cooped up for two or three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そっちが本音ね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's your true feelings, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、揃ったな。出撃……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we're all here. Let's move out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラーーーンスーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Raaaanceee!
Oh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっほー、来ちゃった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heya, I came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムに行くんでしょ？　あたしも行くよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're going to Custom, right? I'm coming too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ミルか。なんだ、こっちに来てたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mil, huh. So you were over here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、ラン姉ちゃんと一緒にね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, with big sister Ran.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、ランスには会っちゃダメーって言われて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I was told not to meet Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーー……うーむ、重症だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahh... hmm, that's serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、こっそり来ちゃった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I came secretly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ね、ね、ランス。あたしを連れて、逃げて♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, hey, Rance. Take me with you, let's run away ♪

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミルはランスにするりと近づき、しなを作る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mil smoothly approached Rance and arched her back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスの……初めての人のためなら頑張るよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For Rance... if it's for your first time, I'll do my best, okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦う方も、エロい方も……ね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both in battle and in the erotic side... okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあよかろう。連れてってやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, all right. I'll take you with me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足は引っ張るなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't slow me down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わーい、やったー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yay, I did it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （初めて会った頃に比べれば充分食べ頃に育ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Compared to when I first met her, she's matured enough to be 'ripe',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中身はまだガキだな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but inside she's still a kid...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、瞬間的にムラッと来たら襲えばいいか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, if I get a sudden urge, I can just attack then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では……出発しますか、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then... shall we depart, Lord Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう。カスタムへゴーだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah. Let's go to Custom.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここを……こうして……ああ違う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here... like this... Ah no,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちを先に書いておかないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I need to write this part first...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 進軍の休憩中、マリアは何か書き物をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the march break, Maria was writing something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何やってんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you doing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん。チューリップ3号を起動させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm. I'm compiling the steps to activate Tulip No. 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手順をまとめててね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm summarizing the procedure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現地で混乱しないようにしないと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So we don't get confused on site.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう全部ぶっ壊されてたりして」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe everything's already been destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やめてよも〜……心配なんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop it... I'm worried you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、起動にメモって、そんな厄介なのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, writing notes to start it up, is it really that troublesome?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使い物になるんだろうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's going to be usable, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでもないわよ。私じゃなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not exactly. It's so that the other disciples don't get stuck, not me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の弟子達が手間取らないように、だもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want the other disciples to have difficulties.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁ……そういえばなんか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... come to think of it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前んとこの女の子が付いてきてたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of the girls from your group was following along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが振り返ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance turned around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作業着姿の女の子の集団が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a group of girls dressed in work clothes were,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い思いに休憩を取っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: taking breaks as they pleased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一人くらいつまみ食いしてもいいか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it okay if I sneak a bite of just one?
Absolutely not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地帯中部、ゴア――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Central Free City Zone, Goa――――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイは、単身で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Ray, alone,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, writing notes to start it up, is it really that troublesome?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使い物になるんだろうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's going to be usable, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでもないわよ。私じゃなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not exactly. It's so that the other disciples don't get stuck, not me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の弟子達が手間取らないように、だもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want the other disciples to have difficulties.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁ……そういえばなんか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... come to think of it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前んとこの女の子が付いてきてたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of the girls from your group was following along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが振り返ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance turned around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作業着姿の女の子の集団が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a group of girls dressed in work clothes were,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い思いに休憩を取っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: taking breaks as they pleased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一人くらいつまみ食いしてもいいか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it okay if I sneak a bite of just one?
Absolutely not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地帯中部、ゴア――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Central Free City Zone, Goa――――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイは、単身で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Ray, alone,
